verses.text: I \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \add even\add* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; and he gave \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* unto me.\f + \fr 77.1 \ft of: or, for\f*

In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* I \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*: my \w sore|strong="H3027"\w* \w ran|strong="H5064"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w ceased|strong="H6313"\w* not: my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to be \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w*.\f + \fr 77.2 \ft sore: Heb. hand\f*

I \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and was \w troubled|strong="H1993"\w*: I \w complained|strong="H7878"\w*, and my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* was \w overwhelmed|strong="H5848"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
Thou \w holdest|strong="H0270"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w waking|strong="H8109"\w*: I am so \w troubled|strong="H6470"\w* that I cannot \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.
I have \w considered|strong="H2803"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*, the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of ancient \w times|strong="H5769"\w*.

I call to \w remembrance|strong="H2142"\w* my \w song|strong="H5058"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: I \w commune|strong="H7878"\w* with mine own \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: and my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* made diligent \w search|strong="H2664"\w*.
Will the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* cast \w off|strong="H2186"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*? and \w will|strong="H3254"\w* he be \w favourable|strong="H7521"\w* no more?

Is his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* clean \w gone|strong="H0656"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*? doth \add his\add* \w promise|strong="H0562"\w* \w fail|strong="H1584"\w* for \w evermore|strong="H1755"\w*?\f + \fr 77.8 \ft for evermore: Heb. to generation and generation?\f*

Hath \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* to be \w gracious|strong="H2589"\w*? hath he in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* shut \w up|strong="H7092"\w* his tender \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*? \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* my \w infirmity|strong="H2470"\w*: \add but I will remember\add* the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.

I will \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w works|strong="H4611"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*\nd*: surely I will \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*.
I will \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* also of all thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, and \w talk|strong="H7878"\w* of thy \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*.

Thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add is\add* in the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*: who \add is so\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* as \add our\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?

Thou \add art\add* the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w*: thou hast \w declared|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Thou hast with \add thine\add* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* and \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

The \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* thee, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* thee; they were \w afraid|strong="H2342"\w*: the \w depths|strong="H8415"\w* also were \w troubled|strong="H7264"\w*.

The \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* poured \w out|strong="H2229"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: the \w skies|strong="H7834"\w* sent \w out|strong="H5414"\w* a \w sound|strong="H6963"\w*: thine \w arrows|strong="H2687"\w* also went \w abroad|strong="H1980"\w*.\f + \fr 77.17 \ft pouredâ€¦: Heb. were poured forth with water\f*

The \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of thy \w thunder|strong="H7482"\w* \add was\add* in the \w heaven|strong="H1534"\w*: the \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w* \w lightened|strong="H0215"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*: the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w trembled|strong="H7264"\w* and \w shook|strong="H7493"\w*.

Thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add is\add* in the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and thy \w path|strong="H7635"\w* in the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, and thy \w footsteps|strong="H6119"\w* are not \w known|strong="H3045"\w*.
Thou \w leddest|strong="H5148"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* like a \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.
